comments.text:
We should update our canvas test suite to be the same as the latest version created by philip.

http://philip.html5.org/tests/canvas/suite/tests/

Preferably we would update our test harness so that we can run the upstream test suite directly, rather than having to convert it to our format.

This would make it much easier to maintain this test suite going forward.
comments.raw_text:
We should update our canvas test suite to be the same as the latest version created by philip.

This would make it much easier to maintain this test suite going forward.
